metadata.title: CVE-2018-10861 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way ceph mon handles user requests. Anyauthenticated ceph user having read access to ceph can delete, create cephstorage pools and corrupt snapshot images. Ceph branches master, mimic,luminous and jewel are believed to be affected.

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
